attributes.action: nominate the runner-up in the 2008 London Mayoral race for President of Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The runner-up in the 2008 London Mayoral election should be put forward as the President of Europe.

With strong lobbying, I believe they would be the best candidate for the job and would be elected unopposed.

This would save thousands of Euros and also ensure this new and exciting job went to an appropriate pair of hands.

Whichever way round the London Mayoral race goes, this is a good result for Britain and a good result for Europe.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
